00027 #ifndef BZ_BLITZ_H
00028 #define BZ_BLITZ_H
00029 
00030 /*
00031  * These symbols allow use of the IEEE and System V math libraries
00032  * (libm.a and libmsaa.a) on some platforms.
00033  */
00034 
00035 #ifdef BZ_ENABLE_XOPEN_SOURCE
00036  #ifndef _ALL_SOURCE
00037   #define _ALL_SOURCE
00038  #endif
00039  #ifndef _XOPEN_SOURCE
00040   #define _XOPEN_SOURCE
00041  #endif
00042  #ifndef _XOPEN_SOURCE_EXTENDED
00043   #define _XOPEN_SOURCE_EXTENDED 1
00044  #endif
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 #include <blitz/compiler.h>          // Compiler-specific directives
00048 #include <blitz/tuning.h>            // Performance tuning
00049 #include <blitz/tau.h>               // Profiling
00050 
00051 #ifdef BZ_HAVE_STL
00052   #include <string>
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 #ifdef BZ_HAVE_STD
00056   #include <iostream>
00057   #include <iomanip>
00058   #include <cstdio>                    // sprintf, etc.
00059   #include <cmath>
00060 #else
00061   #include <iostream.h>
00062   #include <iomanip.h>
00063   #include <stdio.h>                   // sprintf, etc.
00064   #include <math.h>
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 #ifdef BZ_HAVE_COMPLEX
00068   #include <complex>
00069 #endif
00070 
00071 #define BZ_THROW                     // Needed in <blitz/numinquire.h>
00072 
00073 BZ_NAMESPACE(blitz)
00074 
00075 #ifdef BZ_HAVE_STD
00076  BZ_USING_NAMESPACE(std)
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 #ifdef BZ_GENERATE_GLOBAL_INSTANCES
00080  #define _bz_global
00081  #define BZ_GLOBAL_INIT(X)   =X
00082 #else
00083  #define _bz_global extern
00084  #define BZ_GLOBAL_INIT(X) 
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 /* Define types for indexing, depending on whether 64- or 32-bit
00088    indices are desired. There are separate typedefs for sizeType and
00089    indexType, because it might be useful to have possibility of arrays
00090    with 64-bit numbers of elements without paying the size overhead of
00091    making all dimensional indexes 64-bit.
00092  */
00093 // Used for dimensional indexes (not implemented yet).
00094 #ifdef BZ_FULLY64BIT
00095 #warning 64-bit array dimensions not yet implemented
00096 typedef ptrdiff_t indexType; 
00097 #else
00098 typedef int indexType; 
00099 #endif
00100 typedef size_t sizeType; // Used for memory indexing
00101 typedef ptrdiff_t diffType; // Used for memory index differences, ie strides
00102 
00103 BZ_NAMESPACE_END
00104 
00105 /*
00106  * Thread safety issues.
00107  * Compiling with -pthread under gcc, or -mt under solaris,
00108  * should automatically define _REENTRANT. Also have support
00109  * for OpenMP (which defines _OPENMP) or Windows thread implementation.
00110  * The --enable-threadsafe configure option now defines BZ_THREADSAFE.
00111  */
00112 
00113 /*
00114  * Which mutex implementation should be used for synchronizing
00115  * reference counts.  Options are pthreads, OpenMP, or Windows threads.
00116  */
00117 #ifdef BZ_THREADSAFE
00118  #if defined(_REENTRANT)
00119   #define BZ_THREADSAFE_USE_PTHREADS
00120  #elif defined (_OPENMP)
00121   #define BZ_THREADSAFE_USE_OPENMP
00122  #elif defined(_WIN32)
00123   #define BZ_THREADSAFE_USE_WINDOWS
00124  #endif
00125 #endif
00126 
00127 #ifdef BZ_THREADSAFE_USE_PTHREADS
00128  #include <pthread.h>
00129 
00130  #define BZ_MUTEX_DECLARE(name)   mutable pthread_mutex_t name;
00131  #define BZ_MUTEX_INIT(name)      pthread_mutex_init(&name,NULL);
00132  #define BZ_MUTEX_LOCK(name)      pthread_mutex_lock(&name);
00133  #define BZ_MUTEX_UNLOCK(name)    pthread_mutex_unlock(&name);
00134  #define BZ_MUTEX_DESTROY(name)   pthread_mutex_destroy(&name);
00135 #elif defined (BZ_THREADSAFE_USE_WINDOWS)
00136  // Include Windows.h header in case user has not already done so.
00137  // Disable Windows min/max macro definitions
00138  #define NOMINMAX
00139  #include <Windows.h>
00140 
00141  #define BZ_MUTEX_DECLARE(name)   mutable CRITICAL_SECTION name;
00142  #define BZ_MUTEX_INIT(name)      ::InitializeCriticalSection(&name);
00143  #define BZ_MUTEX_LOCK(name)      ::EnterCriticalSection(&name);
00144  #define BZ_MUTEX_UNLOCK(name)    ::LeaveCriticalSection(&name);
00145  #define BZ_MUTEX_DESTROY(name)   ::DeleteCriticalSection(&name);
00146 #elif defined (BZ_THREADSAFE_USE_OPENMP)
00147  #include <omp.h>
00148 
00149  #define BZ_MUTEX_DECLARE(name)   mutable omp_lock_t name;
00150  #define BZ_MUTEX_INIT(name)      omp_init_lock(&name);
00151  #define BZ_MUTEX_LOCK(name)      omp_set_lock(&name);
00152  #define BZ_MUTEX_UNLOCK(name)    omp_unset_lock(&name);
00153  #define BZ_MUTEX_DESTROY(name)   omp_destroy_lock(&name);
00154 #else
00155  #define BZ_MUTEX_DECLARE(name)
00156  #define BZ_MUTEX_INIT(name)
00157  #define BZ_MUTEX_LOCK(name)
00158  #define BZ_MUTEX_UNLOCK(name)
00159  #define BZ_MUTEX_DESTROY(name)
00160 #endif
00161 
00162 #include <blitz/bzdebug.h>           // Debugging macros
00163 
00164 #endif // BZ_BLITZ_H
